welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Astorp, Sweden - a charming city known for its beautiful landscape and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Angelholm Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Angelholm Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
